sentences.en: At 19.5 days, the somatic cloned mice were delivered by Caesarean secession.
sentences.cn: 19.5天后, 通过剖腹产获得体细胞克隆小鼠.

sentences.en: Autosomes Paired somatic chromosomes that play no part in sex determination.
sentences.cn: 常染色体:配对的体细胞染色体,在性别决定过程中不起作用.

sentences.en: Cancer genetics, somatic mutagenesis, DNA repair, genomics and molecular medicine.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤发生的遗传机制; 体细胞突变的发生机制; DNA修复, 基因组学与分子医学.

sentences.en: Genetic therapies are of two sorts: somatic and germ - line.
sentences.cn: 基因疗法分为两种类型: 机体疗法和种系疗法.

sentences.en: In nurturing the process of Dolly, scientists used somatic cell cloning technology.
sentences.cn: 在培育多利羊的过程中, 科学家采用了体细胞克隆技术.
体细胞杂交是一种技术.

sentences.en: Somatic cells are produced from preexisting cells.
sentences.cn: 体细胞产生自原始细胞.

sentences.en: Somatic effects are those which cause damage to the individual.
sentences.cn: 躯体的影响是指对个人造成的损失.

sentences.en: Somatic Embryogenesis from Protoplast - derived Callus in Soybean ( Glycine max L. )
sentences.cn: 大豆原生质体愈伤组织的体细胞胚胎发生 ( 英文 )

sentences.en: Telomeres are a special structure of chromosomal ends of somatic cells.
sentences.cn: 端粒是真核细胞染色体末端的特殊结构.
这种伤害只是肉体上的。

sentences.en: This process resulted in 1 , 307 confirmed somatic mutations in 1, 149 genes.
sentences.cn: 该过程发现1149个基因的1307种被证实的体细胞突变.

sentences.en: We did not detect any somatic mutation in PTCH gene.
sentences.cn: 追踪四个月并无复发的迹象.

sentences.en: What somatic - cell nuclear transfer technology produces are cloned human embryos.
sentences.cn: 肉体细胞核心移植技术生产的是克隆人的胚胎.

sentences.en: With organisms of sufficient complexity, behavioral and somatic evolution emerged.
sentences.cn: 由于生物体拥有了足够的复杂性, 行为和肢体的进化显露出现.

trans.tran_cn: 肉体的，躯体的，身体的，体壁
trans.tran_en: of or relating to the soma
